BondGraphs.Component — Type
Component(type, name=type)
Component(type, name=type; library=BondGraphs.DEFAULT_LIBRARY, <keyword arguments>)

Construct a Component of a defined (bondgraph) type ∈ {R, C, I, Se, Sf, TF, Ce, Re, SCe}. Properties and equations of available componets are defined in BondGraphs.DEFAULT_LIBRARY.

source
BondGraphs.Component — Type
Component{N} <: AbstractNode

N-port bond graph component.

source
BondGraphs.EqualEffort — Type
EqualEffort <: Junction

Efforts are all equal, flows sum to zero (aka 0-junction).

source
BondGraphs.EqualFlow — Type
EqualFlow <: Junction

Flows are all equal, efforts sum to zero (aka 1-junction).

source
BondGraphs.SourceSensor — Type
SourceSensor <: AbstractNode

Special component type that acts as a source of both effort and flow

source
BondGraphs.connect! — Method
connect!(bg, srcnode, dstnode)

Connect two components together in the same bond graph.

source
